title: [Neuroscience] Scientists have found almost a quarter of elite adult rugby players have brain structure abnormalities as a result of repeated head impacts. The study also found 50 per cent of the rugby players had an unexpected reduction in brain volume.

[Medicine] Evidence of a cannabis ‘entourage effect’ - Certain cannabinoids had up to 14-fold higher plasma concentrations when administered in combination, as a cannabis extract, vs alone in mice. This might explain the therapeutic effects reported for low-dose CBD products.
